trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> Web server control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control allows a text string to be used as a control on a Web page.

In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
The LiteralDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a design-time change to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control on the design surface.
Called when there is a change to the associated control.

The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is raised.
Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a `Properties` grid change).
The OnComponentChanged creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> object and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> base method.
The object that is the source of the event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
